title: Brigitte Giraud Wins Goncourt Prize With Tragic Novel of Loss
description: The prestigious French literary award went to “Living Fast,” or “Vivre Vite,” which explores the causes of an accident that killed the author’s partner.
dc:creator: Constant Méheut
media:credit: Julien De Rosa/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:description: Brigitte Giraud in Paris in October. Previous Goncourt winners include Marcel Proust, Simone de Beauvoir and Marguerite Duras.
